https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6HzzJYaYyLSDy7xjzDg4ZZd1qXD.jpg Investigator Yonezawa is searching images from the Tokyo Big City Marathon, targeted for a terrorist bomb attack. Within the images he sees his former wife Kazuko, and the following day he learns that dead body that looks like her has been discovered. AIBOU: CSI Files
